oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Opryland Music Demo Recordings - Y-70
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording is of a group of demo recordings from Opryland Music. Recordings are from an unknown date and recorded by an unknown band. Tape is labeled Y-70.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:06) See the Pretty Rainbow (Joe Johnson & Eddie Hirst) -- (02:017) The Same Sweet Girl (Hank Locklin) -- (05:01) The Richest Folks in Memphis (Ferguson) -- (07:10) Pretty Words of Love (Ruby Allmond) -- (09:35) Playboy (Chandler & Stevenson) -- (11:33) Perriwinkle (Fuller) -- (14:19) On My Mind (Ruby Allmond) -- (16:30) Oh Why (Jean Chapel) -- (19:16) No One But You (Howard White & Baird) -- (22:03) Nights Without You (Johnson & Hirst) -- (24:43) Nevertheless (I Still Cry For You) (Jerry Fuller) -- (27:06) Nashville Tennessee (Lady Be So Good To Me) (Colley) -- (30:38) My Baby's Out of Sight (Ruby Allmond) -- (34:01) Mom was There (Jerry Fuller) -- (36:55) The Merry Go Round of Love (Robert Lee Floyd) -- (39:27) Memories (Johnson & Hirst) -- (42:35) [Unidentified] ([Unidentified]) -- (44:28) Love Was Made for Lovin' You (Deal) -- (46:25) Sugar Stealin' Baby (Virgil F. Stewart) -- (48:54) Lonesome Dollar Bill ([Unidentified]) -- (51:42) Little by Little (Chuck Deal) -- (53:55) It's Gonna Get a Whole Lot Worse (Before it Gets Better) (Tucker & Jones) -- (56:08) I'm Comin' Down With the Heartaches (Bruce) -- (58:41) I'd Do It Again (Bob Morris) -- (1:01:15) I Can Talk to You (Chapel) -- (1:03:07) The Hippy Rug Song (Bennett) -- (1:04:42) Help Me to Forget (Chapel) -- (1:07:52) Happiness Express (Colley & Colley) -- (1:10:13) Funny Faces (Beau Charles) -- (1:13:02) Leave a Little Play (In the Chain of Love) (Dickens & Kirby) -- (1:15:41) Lord When You do the Counting, Count Me in (Sun Child) -- (1:02:28) The Closer You Get (Jean Chapel) -- (1:23:34) Advise and Consent (Tommy Blake) -- (1:26:02) Alligator Davey (Barnette & Osborne)
